description:
International Trade Finance (ITF) provides a comprehensive approach to structure complex financial transactions for a variety of stakeholders, including importers and exporters, commodity traders, freight-forwarders, multinational institutions and private investors. Our experienced team understands that to execute trade finance transactions in today’s volatile global markets demands creativity and flexibility. As such, ITF utilizes an array of trade and export finance instruments to mitigate unnecessary credit risks while increasing clients’ access to working capital. While we provide specialized supply chain finance arrangements as a deal dictates, our general services typically fall into one of the following four (4) categories:

Documentary Letters of Credit;
Standby Letters of Credit;
Bank Guarantees; and
SWIFT Services.

In keeping with ITF’s mission statement, our team tailors each instrument to the meet the requirements of each transaction. By providing the highest quality services to our partners, ITF maintains an unparalleled reputation among the international trade community.

After becoming a partner, our team at ITF will guide you through the early stages of your deal, until the transaction is finalized.

contact us 
info@intltradefinance.com
name: International Trade Finance, LLC
searchQueries: Tea importers and distributors in Germany

description:
Since 1983, InterAmerican has been supplying specialty green coffee to roasters across North America.

Through our 40+ sister companies in 27 countries, as well as through old and new relationships that we consistently seek out, nurture and forge, we source and import some of the world’s best coffees. These include certified Organic, Fair Trade and Rainforest Alliance coffees, quality and price options from traceable blend components to unique small-lot offerings, and coffees through special projects designed to improve both cup quality and the lives and futures of coffee growers and producers.

Our headquarters is in Hoboken, N.J., and we additionally have Trading teams and Quality Control labs in Providence, Houston and San Diego. And proudly, we’re ­­­part of the Neumann Kaffee Gruppe (NKG)—the world’s leading green coffee company—which gives us access to numerous other quality-control labs and on-the-ground experts around the globe.

NKG’s global breadth and strength help us to consistently acquire the coffees our customers love—and to keep discovering beautiful new ones. Our decades of experience have refined and strengthened our logistics operations. And the expertise and passion our teams bring to work each day help us to positively impact the supply chain, both locally and globally. Together, these factors make for a company we couldn’t be prouder of.

We invite you to cup with us, train with us and explore with us. And to share how we can help you to keep growing along with us.
name: InterAmerican Coffee

description:
POOLCORP is the world's leading wholesale distributor of swimming pool equipment, parts and supplies, and related outdoor living products. The company operates over 370 locations worldwide with more than 4,000 employees through three primary distribution networks: SCP Distributors LLC, Superior Pool Products LLC, and Horizon Distributors Inc. Our Sales Centers each operate with full profit and loss responsibility, giving our organization an entrepreneurial spirit.

With Sales Centers located across North America (US, Canada, and Mexico), Europe (France, UK, Spain, Portugal, Italy, Belgium, Germany, and Croatia), South America (Colombia), and Australia, we distribute a broad range of products to roughly 120,000 customers around the world, serving four principal markets:

Remodelers and builders installing new swimming pools and refurbishing existing pools
Independent specialty retail stores selling outdoor living products to consumers
Service companies performing pool and hot tub maintenance and repair
Contractors serving in the irrigation and landscape maintenance markets
POOLCORP’s Sales Center networks distribute non-discretionary pool maintenance products such as chemicals and replacement parts; discretionary products such as packaged pool kits, whole goods, irrigation and landscape products, including a complete line of commercial and residential irrigation products and parts, power equipment for the professional landscape market; specialty products such as outdoor lighting, grills, and outdoor kitchen components; as well as golf irrigation and water management products.
name: SCP Distributors/ Superior Pool Products

description:
ARTEK METAL Industry & Trade Co. Ltd. is one of the top glass importers of Turkey.
Our company consists of several companies that are having business in glass importing, 
glass processing, warehousing, bonded warehousing.

We are importing glass over 25 years. The firm has become a brand in the domestic and overseas markets with its quality service, suitable price, customer relations based on long-standing friendship, and honest trading.

As a float glass importer in Turkey and we are working with world wide known factories like Asahi, Guardian, Pilkington, Saratov, Taiwan Glass. (alphabetically ordered)

We are agent of Taiwan Glass for Turkey and Bulgaria market. 

We import from all over the world: Germany, England, Luxemburg, Taiwan, India, Russia, Romania, Ukraine, Belgium, China, Iran, Bulgaria, Israel, Czech Republic. 

Our warehouse with 8.000 m2 covered area is established on a 15.000 m2 land plot and all of our imports and merchandise distribution are made from our head office located in Istanbul.

There are three cranes in our warehouse. Our loadings are made safely with our professional team.

Also in Izmir city we have 22.000m2 covered area that is making glass processing in the name of Dost Cam.

All type of glass processing is taking place excluding automobile glass in this facility. 

Every ancillary industries about glass processing is serviced in this factory like tempered, laminated, side covering, double glazing, decorative glass making etc. It is top glass processer in Izmir with its machine park. It has over 500 customer references. 

In Gebze 22000m2 area is under construction which is expected to completed end of 2010 that is going to be Istanbul branch for glass processing. All land areas belonging to our company.
name: Artek Metal San. Tic. Ltd. Sti.

description:
Brioche Dorée is a French chain of Bakery/Café restaurants founded in 1976 and originally started in Brest. The company was founded by Louis Le Duff, current president of Groupe Le Duff. The chain has worldwide operations and is the second largest Bakery/Café chain in the world. It serves over 300,000 customers every day and operates over 550 restaurants. The name means "Golden Brioche"​ in French.

Brioche Dorée North America currently has 32 locations in North America: 17 in the United States and 15 in Canada.

The company also has operations in the Switzerland, Luxembourg, Algeria, Costa Rica, Czech Republic, Denmark, United Kingdom, Germany, Argentina, Morocco, Saudi Arabia, Syria, China, South Korea, Japan, UAE, Oman, Kuwait, Qatar and Bahrain.
name: Brioche Dorée North America

description:
We have already set the industry standard for international containerized auto shipping. Now, our mission is to continue to innovate and disrupt the old ways of doing things while maintaining and inspiring company culture, and providing our customers with the industry’s highest level of quality and service. We operate like a startup - thinking creatively, quickly and deploying solutions rapidly, around the globe. In recognition of our efforts, in 2019 we received the Automotive Logistics Magazine’s prestigious Transport Innovation award. 

Our core business includes transporting cars in containers globally and domestically using the revolutionary “R-Rak” loading system. Within the automotive space, we work with:

- Car manufacturers (OEMs)
- Rental car companies
- Fleet owners and operators
- Large dealers and importers
- Classic car dealers

We also work with hundreds of shippers of other goods - including boats, spas, household goods, and other non-perishables. We can ship almost anything, anywhere!

Our offices are located around the United States, Germany and China. Our shipping specialists are standing by to answer any questions you may have. Give us a call, live chat with us on our website or shoot us an email at sales@cfrrinkens.com, or visit our website www.cfrrinkens.com for more information.
name: CFR Rinkens LLC

description:
Thank you for visiting our LinkedIn Page !

🍀 About Us: 
Vstorks is a trusted exporter of Wood & Wicker Furniture, Water Hyacinths, Wood Deck Tiles, and Handicrafts. In 2018, Vstorks (Outdoor Furniture and Handicrafts Supplier) was founded by a dynamic and young team with the mission is to provide high-quality products from our most trusted Vietnamese manufacturers and traditional craft villages to wholesales importers around the world at competitive prices. By this way, we could bring more jobs for Vietnamese farmers as well as improve their lives. Let's be with me to make dreams come true!

🍀 Our Products
Vstorks currently focuses on four main categories including Wicker Furniture, Wooden Furniture, Water Hyacinth, and Rattan & Bamboo Handicrafts. In addition, we provide customized designs to suit your merchandise plans. Recently, we added "Flooring Deck Tiles" as the newest product in our ecosystem. 

Our home and décor products have been exported to over 20 countries and regions in America, Europe, Australia, and Southeast Asia. As an international company with offices in the U.S. and Vietnam, our dedicated staff of professionals is ready to provide product information and respond to your requests effectively and quickly. 

🍀 Core Values:
 Vstorks (standing for Vietnamese Storks like the nursey fable of magical birds who deliver precious goods) who are obsessed with bringing high-quality, village-style rattan items and wooden products made in Vietnam to the global marketplace and consumers.
Our company values have driven our decisions and operations since day one, and we are incredibly proud to deliver high quality products and excellent service. As we continue to serve our customers and work to build a trusted company, it’s equally important that we consistently deliver on our commitments. 

-----------------

description:
We are experts when it comes to powerful software solutions for food producing companies. Whether vegetables, cheese, exotic fruits and more – our customers benefit from products specially adapted to their needs – individual and tailor-made!

Maximum efficiency on all production lines is your biggest concern?
Our production control "PECS" takes over the central administration and control of your plants, as well as the time recording of your staff and provides extensive evaluations!

Your import planner is absent due to illness?
"FIPS", our planning software for ripening control, transport and ordering, prevents sources of error that are often not taken into account in day-to-day business.

Do you prefer to handle goods acceptance & quality assessments on your smartphone?
Our mobile "GO!" solutions are where you are - at any time!

Would you like to have all information about your company live and clearly at hand?
With our "LiveApp" you get a real-time overview of all processes and procedures, for example to be able to react promptly to delays or incidents! 

Recognizing inefficiencies or cross-product evaluations are important to you?
With "BI" (Business Intelligence), you can now analyze the large amount of data that your company collects every day in no time at all, even live and mobile on your production database!

Do you recognize yourself in one of the scenarios?
Then let our expertise and experience convince you in a non-binding conversation.
name: activeIT Software & Consulting GmbH

description:
WHO WE ARE
Founded in 1967, & celebrating over 50 years of outstanding service to the plastics industry, Bamberger Polymers markets a full range of thermoplastic resins through our network of sales offices & distribution centers. 

Bamberger markets around the globe with representatives dedicated to all major markets in North America, South America, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Asia, & the Pacific Rim. 

Every year we deliver more than 1 billions pounds of bulk & packaged resins to custom & proprietary manufacturers of plastic products, injection molders, blow molders, compounders & extruders. 

Bamberger offers branded prime, generic prime, & wide-spec resins, including low-density polyethylene, linear low-density polyethylene, high-density polyethylene, polypropylene, PET, polystyrene & engineering thermoplastics. 

OUR MISSION
Bamberger Polymers distributes high quality prime-spec & wide-spec plastic resins to customers worldwide. Our success is predicated on providing the right product at the right price at the right time. 

OUR VISION
Bamberger Polymers seeks to continue to build upon its history of success & become the world's most trusted name in plastic resin distribution. We aim to be trusted advisors to our customers & suppliers. Our customer service, support & our ability to consistently provide high quality products should be the mark by which all other business in our market segment are measured. 

OUR VALUES
While priorities & objectives may change, our core values do not. 

- Integrity: We are honest & ethical in each & every transaction. 
- Diligence: We are conscientious, careful, & persistent in our work. 
- Respect: We strive to bring value to every business relationship. 

These values guide our actions & our planning as we grow business to include new opportunities. We measure our success by our ability to build & maintain strong, mutually profitable relationships with our customers, suppliers, employees & stakeholders.
name: Bamberger Polymers

description:
The International Bulk Wine and Spirits Show (IBWSS) aims to gather suppliers & buyers of bulk wine/spirits, private label, contract distilling/brewing, contract winemaking from all over the world. It is an annual trade show and conference, open to trade professionals only, which takes place in San Francisco, CA. 

● Who can exhibit at IBWSS SF 2024?
- Wineries and Distilleries looking to sell bulk wine/ spirits.
- Producers, suppliers, and negociants who offer contract manufacturing / private label programs.
- Importers/ Wineries/ Distilleries who have one-time excess stock to clear.
- Grape Growers/ Vintners Associations & Custom crush service providers.
- Bulk Logistics Partners, Contract Bottlers and Wine/ Spirits bottle label Designers.


● Who can attend the show?
- Wineries and Distilleries looking to meet up their demand.
- Importers, Retailers, and Distributors looking for private label programs.
- Negociants who are looking to meet the growers and producers from all over the world.
name: International Bulk Wine & Spirits Show

description:
Webster Barnes is a wine, spirits, and beer supplier with offices in France and the U.S. 

We have worked diligently to cultivate exclusive relationships with some of the highest quality wine, beer, and spirits producers worldwide. 
We work directly with producers in 6 continents, allowing us unfettered access to an incredibly wide range of product options: providing our clients the best prices for their products by circumventing agents and middlemen.

From first growth and grand cru Bordeaux and Burgundy to Japanese sake breweries, from ready to drink cocktails to aromatized sparkling wine in almost any flavor imaginable, from the best quality to price-ratio wine in any hemisphere to monks brewing beer in the same Belgian Abbey for hundreds of years and everything in between, there is virtually nothing that we can’t find for you. Mendoza to Montrachet, Prague to Perth, Chianti to Cape Town, Sancerre to Sauternes – we’ve got it covered.

We are importers, consultants, market experts, artists and brand promoters that provide custom solutions and a full range of support services from conception to sales and consumer training. Our business model is collaborative, and we treat our suppliers and distributors as partners, allowing us to forge solid relationships spanning both time and distance.

We are a team with more than 50 years collective experience in the adult beverage field, offering us a unique perspective that provides the ability to expertly find solutions for all of your project needs, no matter the package contents or its retail price.
name: Webster Barnes

description: Equal Origins (formerly The Partnership for Gender Equity) works to advance gender equity in agriculture with a focus on coffee and cocoa. Our tools and approach support industry engagement and investment in gender equity across the value chain. Our evidence-based approach comprises three core elements: a validated set of tools, a common language for gender equity and a platform for action that supports scalable investments and action across the sector. By harnessing the power of collective action within the industry, growers, buyers, exporters, importers, roasters, private foundations, development agencies, academic institutions and more, PGE endeavors to drive positive impact from community to cup, and for every step in between.
name: Equal Origins (The Partnership for Gender Equity)

description:
Curt Maria Medical GmbH produces certified medical products in Germany according to MPG. We produce up to 15 million medical face masks per month on our fully automated production lines. All our products are certified according to the European standards EN14683:2019 in the types I/II/II R. 

Due to the Corona Pandemic, the demand for medical consumables has increased dramatically worldwide. The scarcity of the coveted raw materials and a proliferation of manufacturers and importers have turned the rules of the medical market upside down. Not every imported product can be fully trusted. Curt Maria Medical GmbH stands for the establishment of a reliable, high-quality volume production of medical products in Germany.
name: Curt Maria Medical GmbH
